name: mimeo-framework
author: Thomas Rubbert

scripts.develop: npm run server:start; npm run watch:development
scripts.build:production: node_modules/.bin/browserify src/Mimeo.js -t [ babelify ] -t uglifyify -g uglifyify -o dist/mimeo.min.js --no-builtins --standalone mimeo
scripts.build: npm run build:development; npm run build:production
scripts.server:stop: kill $(cat server.pid) && rm server.pid && rm server.log

description: A dependency-injection frontend framework for small projects that mimics angulars api
